messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Grettings comrades, Brouzof Chomski is now your Supreme Leader, and will lead this station to glory in the name of the motherland!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Mixing Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Brainwashing is not the cargonian way, we convert our members through buying cool shit for them

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Biggie Bongie the captain has come to aid me, Supreme Leader Brouzof, in running this great nation

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Turns out this other cap is a massive comdom

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, not more than 15 squeaking things have swarmed into the [REDACTED].
